item.content:encoded:

Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=DenJustPro&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

item.author: Denver Justice Project

item.title: As outrage grows around Rogel Aguilera-Mederos' unjust...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Justice Project

As outrage grows around Rogel Aguilera-Mederos' unjust 110-year prison sentence, millions have united to speak out against this harsh ruling - even the judge who handed it down. URGE GOVERNOR POLIS to take action and grant Rogel clemency by joining us Wednesday, December 22 at 10:30 A.M. on the Capitol Steps. #JusticeforRogel

https://fb.me/e/4fITDR5Ur

ESPAÑOL-

...

A medida que crece la indignación en torno a la injusta sentencia de 110 años de prisión de Rogel Aguilera-Mederos, millones se han unido para hablar en contra de este duro fallo, incluso el juez que lo dictó. INSTA AL GOBERNADOR POLIS a tomar medidas y conceder el indulto a Rogel uniéndose a nosotros el miércoles 22 de diciembre a las 10:30 a. M. en los escalones del Capitolio. #JusticiaParaRogel

https://fb.me/e/4fITDR5Ur

See more

WED, DEC 22

Rally for Justice for Rogel Aguilera-Mederos

Colorado State CapitalCauses · 1,407 people
item.author: Denver Justice Project

item.title: Please donate, Please share, and Please support this time...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Justice Project

Please donate, Please share, and Please support this time sensitive fundraiser. Whatever funds are not raised will be covered out of pocket. We will shut this down Friday evening, our goal is $1000.

This Saturday from 2pm to 3:30pm we will host our final community Day of the year. At 3:30 youth would be able to enjoy Urban Air and all the amenities until 9pm if they do choose to do so. We aim to have 60 young people coming to urban air located at 9550 E. 40th Ave., Denver 80238 for an educational focus group separated into youth and parents, to assess experiences in the home, in the community, and how we can better advocate for resources in their communities.

https://gofund.me/0d9dc0d9

Community days. Since January 2021 Youth Empowerment Agency has collaborated with other community … Alexander Landau needs your support for Community Days

Community Days, organized by Alexander Landau

Community days. Since January 2021 Youth Empowerment Agency has collaborated with other community … Alexander Landau needs your support for Community DaysSend message

item.title: “I Don’t Break” a piece about healing by Nina Askew,...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Justice Project

“I Don’t Break” a piece about healing by Nina Askew, Alexander Landau, Keep studios and the Story Corps team…. Please Share..!!

StoryCorps

Friends Alexander Landau and Nina Askew talk about healing from the trauma of police violence, finding support in one another, and the beauty and strength in declaring, “Here I am.” Our Story of the Week, as heard on NPR Morning Edition. https://storycor.ps/3HgYyTD
item.author: Denver Justice Project

item.title: Denver Justice ProjectUnicorn RiotTen years after 29-year-old Black man Alonzo Ashley had a fatal encounter with Denver Police at the Denver...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Justice ProjectUnicorn Riot

Ten years after 29-year-old Black man Alonzo Ashley had a fatal encounter with Denver Police at the Denver Zoo, his family, friends, and the greater community f...inally received some justice. Although no criminal charges were ever filed against anyone involved, on October 1, 2021, a water fountain and cooling station were unveiled near the spot where Ashley took his last breaths, and the Denver Zoo finally apologized for the tragedy.

"This cooling station means so much to our family, especially Gail [Alonzo’s mother]. Everyone here, and even some not here, have fought so hard for justice, accountability, and for Alonzo’s death to not just become another statistic under various reports; to allow him to be remembered. Alonzo deserves this and for his name to live on in an empowering light verse a dark stereotype he was put under ten years ago." -- Ashley Ashley, Alonzo Ashley’s sister-in-law

Learn more about #AlonzoAshley in our article: https://unicornriot.ninja/…/alonzo-ashley-memorialized-at-…/

See more

item.title: This is a real influential program. Denver Justice Project and...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Justice Project

This is a real influential program. Denver Justice Project and other organizations involved in the inception of STAR here in Denver have been in communication with other cities around the United States looking for guidance on how this program could be replicated in their own cities… Keep an eye as we on the expansion team continue to ensure community voice is at the table and that the expansion rollout is having maximum impact in our communities.

https://303magazine.com/tag/star-program/

Denver STAR – The Alternative To 911 – Expands Equitable Mental Crisis Care Ellie SullumNovember 5, 2021 Denver's 911 line now has a fourth option. On August 30, Denver City Council moved to expand funding for the city's Support Team Assisted Response, or STAR, P... 303 MagazineLifestyle + Cultu...

item.author: Denver Justice Project

item.title: “For Denver community activists, it is the first time in their...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Justice Project

“For Denver community activists, it is the first time in their memory where an institution installed a public memorial for someone killed by police and offered a public apology, said Alex Landau of the Denver Justice Project.

“What we’re doing today is monumental toward accountability,” Landau said.”

The Denver Post

Ten years after Alonzo Ashley was killed by Denver police at the Denver Zoo, the zoo dedicated a water fountain and cooling station in his name as part of a restorative justice agreement with his family. The zoo CEO also apologized to Ashley's family.

Ten years after Alonzo Ashley was killed by Denver police at the Denver Zoo, the zoo dedicated a water fountain and cooling station in his name as part of a restorative justice agreement with his f…

denverpost.com

“We are really sorry”: 10 years after a man lost his life at the hands of police at the Denver Zoo, an apology comes

item.title: Denver Justice Project and other Community, local and state...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Justice Project

Denver Justice Project and other Community, local and state officials hosting a community breakout session on how to address community issues that exist in Aurora’s 80010 ZIP Code. Primarily dealing with mental / behavioral health and intersections that can further barrier community members dealing with these issues. (1601 N Havana st city of Aurora Adams county) (Village Exchange Center)

item.title: This is what happens when community is empowered to combat...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Justice Project

This is what happens when community is empowered to combat injustice at its front and legislative lines. Huge props to community organizations and community memembers who put their bodies on the line for this young man and all victims and survivors of law enforce violence.

A grand jury has indicted the Aurora police officers who were involved in Elijah McClain's death two years ago.

cpr.org

Aurora Police Officers Indicted In The 2019 Death Of Elijah McClain

A grand jury has indicted the Aurora police officers who were involved in Elijah McClain's death two years ago.A grand jury has indicted the Aurora police officers who were involved in Elijah McClain's death two years ago.
item.author: Denver Justice Project

item.title: Community, check out this event for addressing mental health in...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Justice Project

Community, check out this event for addressing mental health in Aurora. Come if you can!
https://www.eventbrite.com/e/rebuilding-the-mind-of-colorad…

The Adams CO Town hall Co-op Workshop is a community forum to address Aurora zip code 80010 as ground zero for the state of Colorado.

eventbrite.com

REBUILDING THE MIND OF COLORADO TBI COOP WORKSHOP

item.title: Denver Justice ProjectThe Colorado SunJUST IN: Aurora officers and paramedics connected to Elijah McClain's death facing manslaughter and...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Justice ProjectThe Colorado Sun

JUST IN: Aurora officers and paramedics connected to Elijah McClain's death facing manslaughter and criminally negligent homicide charges.

Aurora police officers and paramedics who stopped Elijah McClain will be charged in his death, Colorado Attorney General Phil Weiser said.

coloradosun.com

Grand jury returns 32-count indictment against Aurora officers, paramedics in Elijah McClain’s death

Aurora police officers and paramedics who stopped Elijah McClain will be charged in his death, Colorado Attorney General Phil Weiser said.Aurora police officers and paramedics who stopped Elijah McClain will be charged in his death, Colorado Attorney General Phil Weiser said.
